item.title: Articubot Project
item.description: Overview The YouTube channel Articulated Robotics by Josh Newans has a very good series of videos of building your own robot. The robot is a simple two-rear-wheeled robot with a front caster wheel (using a simple differential drive approach) with a chassis based on a rectangular plastic bin. The robot brain is a Raspberry Pi 4, and it includes lidar and camera modules. We’ll refer to this robot as the “Articubot”.
